name: Quik: A Gravity Flip Platformer
description:
Flip, bounce, smash and dash your way to victory.

Quik is VVVVVV + Canabalt + irrational idiom.

  • Challenging Gameplay
  • 8 bit Retro style
  • Simple Controls!
  • Anonymous Leaderboards
  • No Sign-in, No IAP, No Ads

An Android version is available, but distributed separately.

  • Demo on Google Play
  • Full version on Google Play

The Mac/Windows/Linux version (including demo) can be downloaded below.
